description: Try our easy to follow Lime & Ginger Beef Noodle Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lime & Ginger Beef Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: fried shallots, coarsely chopped roasted peanuts and red chilli, optional, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Place noodles in a serving bowl, top with onion, herbs, sprouts, cabbage, snow peas and steak. Spoon over dressing, scatter with shallots, peanuts and chilli, if using. Serve with reserved lime cut into wedges.
